p: To examine the effect of essential oils from Abies concolor cones and A. concolor seeds on fibroblast proliferation, the cells were plated in 24-well tissue culture dishes at 1 × 10 5 cells/well with 1 mL of growth medium. After 24 h [(1.6 ± 0.1) × 10 5 cells/well], the plates were incubated with various concentrations of two essential oils or thymol and 0.5 μCi of [ 3H] thymidine for 24 h at 37 °C. Cells were rinsed three times with phosphate buffered saline, solubilized with 1 mL of 0.1 M sodium hydroxide containing 1% sodium dodecyl sulfate. Scintillation liquid (9 mL) was added and radioactivity incorporated into DNA was measured in a scintillation counter [ 25].
